name: @rheactorjs/image-service
description: An image processing backend running on AWS Lambda.

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=testing VERSION=0.0.0 MOUNT_URL=http://example.com WEB_LOCATION=http://images.example.com S3_BUCKET=image-service PUBLIC_KEY_FILE=`hostname`-test.key DEPLOY_TIME=`date +%s` mocha --compilers js:babel-register --reporter=dot --timeout=1350 test/\*\*/\*.js
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=testing VERSION=0.0.0 MOUNT_URL=http://example.com WEB_LOCATION=http://images.example.com S3_BUCKET=image-service PUBLIC_KEY_FILE=`hostname`-test.key DEPLOY_TIME=`date +%s` istanbul cover _mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --reporter=dot --timeout=1350 test/\*\*/\*.js
scripts.test:coverage-travis: NODE_ENV=testing VERSION=0.0.0 MOUNT_URL=http://example.com WEB_LOCATION=http://images.example.com S3_BUCKET=image-service PUBLIC_KEY_FILE=`hostname`-test.key DEPLOY_TIME=`date +%s` istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-register --reporter=dot --timeout=10000 test/\*\*/\*.js && codeclimate-test-reporter < ./coverage/lcov.info && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && make test-prepare && npm run test
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Resourceful Humans GmbH <info@resourceful-humans.com>
